scripts.setup: npm run install-nvm && npm run install-node && npm install && npx wdio config
scripts.install-nvm: if exist "%ProgramFiles%\nvm" (echo NVM is already installed) else (curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows/master/install.ps1 | powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command -)
scripts.install-node: if exist "%ProgramFiles%\nvm" (nvm install 20.18.3 && nvm use 20.18.3) else (curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.39.4/install.sh | bash && export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && source "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm install 20.18.3 && nvm use 20.18.3)
